about_the_game:
Enjoy this full character route for the adorable girl-next-door, Peanut! This is an optional DLC for the main game Hush Hush - Only Your Love Can Save Them.

Features:
  • Unlocks an entirely new storyline involving Peanut
  • Opens up additional scenes and dialogue paths where you can grow closer to Peanut (platonic or romantic)
  • New character art, outfits, CGs, backgrounds and fully voiced lines for various characters
  • Adds more hours of content to the game's total playtime
detailed_description:
Enjoy this full character route for the adorable girl-next-door, Peanut! This is an optional DLC for the main game Hush Hush - Only Your Love Can Save Them.

Features:
  • Unlocks an entirely new storyline involving Peanut
  • Opens up additional scenes and dialogue paths where you can grow closer to Peanut (platonic or romantic)
  • New character art, outfits, CGs, backgrounds and fully voiced lines for various characters
  • Adds more hours of content to the game's total playtime

fullgame.name: Hush Hush - Only Your Love Can Save Them

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04+ or SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel or AMD CPU 1.6GHz+ with SSE2
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia, AMD or Intel Graphics with support for OpenGL 4
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+
  • Processor: Intel 1.6GHz+ with SSE2
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia, AMD or Intel Graphics with support for OpenGL 4
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Hush Hush - Peanut DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD CPU 1.6GHz+ with SSE2
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia, AMD or Intel Graphics with support for DirectX 10 (Shader Model 4.0)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: N/A
